perturbation.original_text: Sponsor shall pay Club the Annual Fee for each Contract Year of this Agreement in six (6) equal installments, each due on or prior to the 1st of each month between June and November of the applicable Contract Year.
perturbation.changed_text: Sponsor shall pay Club the Annual Fee for each Contract Year of this Agreement in six (6) equal installments, each due on or prior to the 15th of each month between June and November of the applicable Contract Year.
perturbation.explanation: The modified text creates an in-text contradiction by changing the due date of the installment payments from the 1st to the 15th of each month. This creates uncertainty regarding which payment schedule should be enforced, potentially leading to disputes over late payment penalties.

perturbation.original_text: Sponsor shall pay the Playoff Payments in accordance with Section 2(d) of the Terms and Conditions not later than 30 days following Sponsor's receipt of an invoice requesting payment for such Playoff Games; provided that Club's failure to deliver such an invoice shall not, and not be construed to, relieve Sponsor of any obligation to pay any amount owed to Club.
perturbation.changed_text: Sponsor shall pay the Playoff Payments in accordance with Section 2(d) of the Terms and Conditions not later than 15 days following Sponsor's receipt of an invoice requesting payment for such Playoff Games; provided that Club's failure to deliver such an invoice shall relieve Sponsor of any obligation to pay any amount owed to Club.
perturbation.explanation: The modified text creates an in-text contradiction by changing the payment deadline for Playoff Payments from 30 to 15 days after invoice receipt. Furthermore, it now states that failure to deliver an invoice *does* relieve the sponsor of their obligation, directly contradicting the original clause. This creates significant uncertainty in payment obligations.

perturbation.original_text: If any portion of the Annual Trade Value is not used in any given Contract Year, such unused amount shall carry forward to the subsequent Contract Year. If any portion of the Annual Trade Value is not used at the end of the Term, Club shall be permitted to use such unused amount within twelve (12) months following expiration of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: If any portion of the Annual Trade Value is not used in any given Contract Year, such unused amount shall not carry forward to the subsequent Contract Year. If any portion of the Annual Trade Value is not used at the end of the Term, Club shall not be permitted to use such unused amount within twelve (12) months following expiration of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The modified text creates an in-text contradiction by negating the carry-over policy for unused Annual Trade Value, stating it *will not* carry over or be usable after the term, which is the direct opposite of the original clause. This introduces uncertainty about the usability of the Annual Trade Value.
